subject: Playoff Games
Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The loss of another defenseman obviously did not help the Buffalo Sabres, and the Carolina Hurricanes reclaimed the home-ice advantage in the best-of-seven series, which is tied at 2-2.
snippet: The loss of another defenseman obviously did not help the Buffalo Sabres, and the Carolina Hurricanes reclaimed the home-ice advantage in the best-of-seven series, which is tied at 2-2.
